SELECT count(a.id) from t_mall_product a WHERE a.is_publish=1 AND a.check_status=1 AND a.is_delete=0
and a.shop_id=#{shopId}
and a.pro_name like '%${proName}%'
and a.id in (select product_id from t_mall_product_group where group_id = #{groupId})

SELECT distinct a.id as id,a.shop_id,a.is_member_discount,a.pro_price,a.pro_name,a.is_specifica,c.image_url,e.specifica_img_url,d.inv_num,d.inv_price,a.change_integral,a.pro_cost_price,a.change_fenbi,a.pro_label,a.pro_type_id,a.member_type,a.user_id, a.pro_sale_total,a.sales_base from t_mall_product a LEFT JOIN (SELECT ass_id,image_url from t_mall_image_associative WHERE ass_type=1 AND is_delete=0 AND is_main_images=1) c ON a.id=c.ass_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_id,specifica_img_id,inv_num,inv_price FROM t_mall_product_inventory where is_default=1 AND is_delete=0)d ON a.id=d.product_id LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_specifica e ON d.specifica_img_id=e.id and e.is_delete=0 left join t_mall_product_group pg on pg.product_id=a.id and pg.is_delete=0 left join t_mall_group g on g.id=pg.group_id and g.is_delete=0 WHERE a.is_publish=1 AND a.check_status=1 AND a.is_delete=0 and g.is_delete=0 and pg.is_delete=0
and a.shop_id=#{shopId}
and (a.pro_name like '%${proName}%' or g.group_name like '%${proName}%')
and a.id=#{id}
and pg.group_id =#{groupId}
and (a.is_integral_change_pro = 1 and a.change_integral > 0)
and (a.is_fenbi_change_pro = 1 and a.change_fenbi > 0)
ORDER BY a.id
ORDER BY a.pro_sale_total+a.sales_base
ORDER BY IF(d.inv_price>0 ,d.inv_price,a.pro_price )
ORDER BY a.change_integral
ORDER BY a.change_fenbi
ORDER BY IF(d.inv_price>0 ,d.inv_price,a.pro_price)
desc
limit #{firstNum},#{maxNum}
